text: Heart of the Andes is an oil painting by Frederic Edwin Church. It was painted in 1859. It measures 66 1/8 x 119 1/4in. (168 x 302.9cm). It hangs in the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City.Heart of the Andes Metropolitan Museum of Art ==References== Category:1850s paintings Category:Paintings in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City Category:American paintings
title: The Heart of the Andes
